text: Hanki ugota ankero ne' Maikoli'a Israeli vahe'motma kegava huneramantea ankeronkino, ana knafina agra otigahie. Ana knafima fore'ma hania knazana, magore huno ama mopafina fore osu'neankna knaza fore hugahie. Hianagi Danieliga kagri vahe'ma zamagima avontafepima me'nesnia vahera Anumzamo'a zamagu vazi'nige'za knare hu'za manigahaze.
